title: Volvo Group - global number of employees 2003 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of employees. In total the number of data points it has is 16.
In general Number of employees has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2006 and 2007.
Maximum Number of employees, about 105175.0 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Number of employees, of value 75740.0 was reported at Year 2003
